name: Last Hope (itch) (Prietse)
description:
https://prietse.itch.io/last-hopetrial
(a working build)

You play as Bloppy de Blue, the protector of the last known sample of the long lost cure. 
You have to protect the vile of the cure,  Be careful  it's the last one! don't drop it and most certainly don't let the monster get a hold of it. 
You have your trusty Gun "Sap.inator" with you , Don't be a fool and use it!  just point with your mouse and click, seems simple enough.
and did I mention that the vile weighs a ton. 
You'll be slowed down when currying the Vile,  press " E " to  place it on the ground gently!
By doing that, you should be able to  find a tree with white sap on it, It that should refill your sap.inator! 
just protect the cure for as long as you can!

sorry can't finish the game,  this is my first gamejam and 2nd game ever built and I failed but I guess I have to better improve my time management skill, anyways, it's lacking music, proper enemy  AI, shooting , health,  and maybe a menu.

Update: somehow there's a problem with loading it with HTML5, Can anyone help? The build totally works with stand alone build, but this is my first time building with HTML5 and uploading to itch.

Update: kinda fixed it ,
